heading: HOW TO BUY
description: Follow these easy steps to become a 'CRAZY CANNONBALL' holder!

firstStep.title: 1. CREATE A WALLET
firstStep.description: Visit PANTOM.APP and follow the simple steps to create a new account with the phantom app or browser extension.

secondStep.title: 2. GET SOME SOL
secondStep.description: To buy a CRAZY CANNONBALL NFT, you need SOL in your wallet. Purchase SOL on Coinbase, transfer from another, or buy on another exchange and send it to your wallet.

thirdStep.title: 3. SWAP SOL FOR A CRAZY CANNONBALL
thirdStep.description: Tap the icon in your Phantom Wallet and paste the Crazy Cannonball token address. Swap your SOL for a CRAZY CANNONBALL NFT.

fourthStep.title: 4. YOU ARE NOW A CRAZY CANNONBALL HOLDER!
fourthStep.description: Congratulations! You are now the proud owner of a CRAZY CANNONBALL NFT. Welcome to the club!
